pluginDesc.message: Git code tree. Support GitHub notifications and git file history

welcome_tip.message:
Hi there, this is GitMaster. Move mouse over this button to display the code tree. You can also press the
          shortkey <kbd>cmd shift s</kbd> (or <kbd>ctrl shift s</kbd>).

token_storage_tip.message: Token is stored in local storage

notify_github_host_tip.message: Specify the root URL to your GitHub Enterprise.

notify_github_token_tip.message: For public repositories,  create a token  with the notifications permission and specify it.

notify_github_token_private_tip.message: If you want notifications for private repositories, you'll need to create a token with the notifications and repo permissions.

notify_github_issue.message: Only show unread count for issues I'm participating in

notify_github_update_count.message: Update notification count after opening a notification

download_url_use_mirror_desc.message: Download GitHub file via jsDelivr CDN

github_mirror_desc.message: Clone and release download for GitHub, Only required by users in China

github_folder_desc.message: Show download button and file size at github file list view

config_build_in_dark_tip.message: When this option is off, extension's dark mode will be controlled by website self.
